options.label: ciliates
options.fig.cap: Species responses to the environmental drivers. (a). Species responses to temperature (°C). (b). Species responses to light intensity

options.label: surface-fig
options.fig.cap: Response surface fitted with GAM. High non-linearity.

options.label: partialderiv-empirical
options.fig.cap: Response surface of Ankistrodesmus The  solid line shows at which level of temperature partial derivativ is going to be calculated.

options.label: partialeffectE1-empirical
options.fig.cap: Partial effect of temperature on the growth rate of Ankistrodesmus when phosphate concentration is held constant at 15μmol L-1.

options.label: partialE1-empirical
options.fig.cap: Partial derivative with respect to temperature on the growth rate of Ankistrodesmus when phosphate concentration is held constant at 15μmol L-1

options.label: partialderivE2-empirical
options.fig.cap: Response surface of Ankistrodesmus. The solid line shows at which level of phosphate the partial derivative is going to be calculated.

options.label: partialeffectE2-empirical
options.fig.cap: Partial effect of phosphate concentration on the growth rate of Ankistrodesmus when temperature is held constant at 27.5°C.

options.label: partialE2-empirical
options.fig.cap: Partial derivative with respect to phosphate concentration when temperature is constant at 27.5°C.

options.label: summary-empirical
options.fig.cap: Summary plot of Ankistrodesmus (a) response surface of Ankistrodesmus (b) Partial effect of temperature on the growth rate of Ankistrodesmus when phosphate concentration is held constant at 15 (μmol L−1). (c) Partial derivative with respect to temperature when phosphate concentration is held constant at 15 (μmol L−1). (d) Partial effect of phosphate concentration on the growth rate of Ankistrodesmus when temperature is held constant at 27.5°C (e) Partial derivative with respect to phosphate concentration when temperature is held constant at 27.5°C.

options.label: RD-empirical
options.fig.cap: Time series of (a) temperature and (b) phosphate concentration changing over time.

options.label: RDempiricalplot
options.fig.cap: Directional derivatives and response diversity with known trajectory of env change. a. Species directional derivatives over time. b. Response diversity measured as similarity-based diversity metric. c. Response diversity measured as divergence (sign sensitive).

options.label: comm1
options.fig.cap: Response surfaces of the species composing community 1

options.label: comm2
options.fig.cap: Response surfaces of the species composing community 2

options.label: ResponseCapcity
options.fig.cap: Response Capacity of (a) community 1 and (b) community 2.

options.label: Uncert_sp
options.fig.cap: Predicted growth rate with the uncertainty vs Measurted values. Black dots are the measured values, and the blue line is the smooth on real data. Adding the posterior fitted samples to the plot of the data, superimposing the Bayesian credible interval on the fitted values we see the posterior draws are largely contained the credible interval.

options.label: Uncert1
options.fig.cap: Predicted growth rate with the uncertainty vs Measured values. Respose curves along the temperature gradient.

options.label: Uncert2
options.fig.cap: Predicted growth rate with the uncertainty vs Measured values. Respose curves along the phosphate gradient.
